metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17127 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The vc1_decode_frame function in libavcodec/vc1dec.c in Libav 12.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2019-03-01

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
